about_the_game:
Sorted is an online co-op game for one to four players. You are a robotic chibi employee traveling across space in a high-tech cargo spaceship. Your mission is simple, to craft and send products within the various sorting stations across the known galaxy. Avoid destruction as you race against the clock, to appease customers both far and near. Work together with your friends to become the most effective sorting company or fall prey to the rival company Skull Express led by Doctor Diabolical. Keep your ship running smoothly and achieve greatness!

  • Machines

Utilize machines to help get the job done. Interact with the stamper, combination, and sorting machines to get those products out of the station and into the hands of your customers.

  • Customization

Customize your robot to sort with style! Make yourself unique by changing accessories ranging from heads, hats, eyewear, and backpacks.

  • Strategy

Find your playstyle as you take on the challenges of each station with its unique layout and environmental hazards that will test your very metal. Will you succeed or succumb to your rival sorting company?

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 3 1300X

short_description: Sorted is an online co-op game for one to four players. You will be tasked to create standard and priority items as employees. Standard items must be sorted and Priority items must be sent to customers. Keep the company alive so it doesn't fall into the hands of Doctor Diabolical!
